verses.roman:
samudrera tīre āsi' yukati karilā
cirāyu-parvata-dike kata-jana gelā

synonyms: samudrera tīre—on the seashore; āsi'-coming; yukati karilā—they consulted among themselves; cirāyu-parvata—of Caṭaka-parvata; dike—in the direction; kata-jana—some of them; gelā—went.
translation: When they arrived at the seashore, they conferred among themselves. Then some of them sought out Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu at Caṭaka-parvata.
